---
title: publish
---

Publish an artifact and optionally rename with parameters

## Argument help

Run the following command to view the module's help page:
```bash
nextflow run openpipelines-bio/openpipeline -r main_build -main-script target/nextflow/transfer/publish/main.nf --help
```

### Arguments



:::{.column-body-outset}
|Name       |Description     |Attributes     |
|:----------|:---------------|:--------------|
|`--input`  |Input filename  |file, required |
|`--output` |Output filename |file, required |
:::
